name: Ships'N Fight
description:
Engage in a mayhem of battles in outer space. Survive epic battles with a barrage of incoming enemy ships, find and team up with your allies to become stronger and fight together, to take down an invasion of enemy ships. 

Play on Web or download for Mac and/or Windows

Controls:

  • Mouse - Player Follows Cursor
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Change Ally Ships Positions - Frontline/Backline
  • ESC - Pause Menu
